title: Would the robot be up for a threesome with the TiVo?
body: <p><a href="http://www.cbs.com/latenight/lateshow/top_ten/archive/ls_topten_archive2006/ls_topten_archive_20060621.shtml">Top Ten Questions To Ask Yourself Before Having Sex With A Robot</a></p>
bodyArticleHtml:
2006-06-22

Would the robot be up for a threesome with the TiVo?

bodyNavItems.text: Would the robot be up for a threesome with the TiVo?
That's IT! I've had it with these motherfucking snakes on this motherfucking plane!
